data.title: College Directory
data.meta_description: The Wilbur O. and Ann Powers College of Business, with Dean Wendy York, hosts the School of Accountancy, Department of Economics, Department of Finance, Department of Graphic Communications, Department of Management, Department of Marketing, Clemson, MBA, Army ROTC and Air Force ROTC. Find contact info on faculty and staff.
